infoPlist.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: RoundBuy would like permission to track your activity across apps and websites owned by other companies. Your data will be used to deliver personalized ads to you.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: RoundBuy needs your location to show nearby search results on the map.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: RoundBuy needs your location to show nearby search results on the map.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: RoundBuy needs camera access to take photos for your advertisements.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: RoundBuy needs access to your photo library to select images for your advertisements.
